description: The base shape of a Datadog software entity

apiVersion.description: The schema version of entity type. The field is known as schema-version in the previous version

kind.description: Kind describes the type of entity

integrations.description: The external integrations of the entity.

datadog.description: The Datadog product associations for the entity.

extensions.description: Custom extensions. This is the free-formed field to send client side metadata. No Datadog features are affected by this field.
